tool_description:
Get airbnb listings details, prices, availability and more using listing IDs, latitude and longitude or "market". 
Data analytics endpoints are also available to get detailed info around all airbnb accomodations.
Data are not in realtime but updated as frequently as possible. Each time property prices, details or statuses are requested we prioritize this property to be updated multiple times/day for the next 24 hours. So on your very first request of a property data you may get not updated data.
name: Airbnb listings
title: Airbnb listings

api_list.name: Listings by market
api_list.description: Retrieve listings ids and last updated dates for prices, availability and ratings in the specified market. Returns 50 results. Can be filtered on bedrooms and max guest capacity

optional_parameters.name: maxGuestCapacity
optional_parameters.description: Max guest the listing can accomodate

test_endpoint.message: You are not subscribed to this API.

api_list.name: Listings by lat lng
api_list.description: Retrieve listings ids, distance from starting point and last updated dates for prices, availability and ratings in a range from a given geographical point. Returns 50 results. Can be filtered on bedrooms and max guest capacity

required_parameters.name: range
required_parameters.description: range in meters from latitude and longitude point

optional_parameters.name: maxGuestCapacity
optional_parameters.description: Max guest the listing can accomodate

api_list.name: Count listings by market
api_list.description: Retrieve listings count in the specified market. Can be filtered on bedrooms and max guest capacity

optional_parameters.name: maxGuestCapacity
optional_parameters.description: Max guest the listing can accomodate

api_list.name: Listings by administrative divisions
api_list.description: Retrieve listings ids and last updated dates for prices, availability and ratings in the specified geographic area. Geocrafic area names can be found from "Get administrative divisions" endpoint. admin* parameters are optional but to use admin2, admin1 is required, to use admin 3, admin2 and admin1 are required and so on. Not respecting this requirement could give you unwanted results (ie listings with cities with the same name but in different countries). Returns 50 results. Can be filtered on bedrooms and max guest capacity

api_list.name: Count  listings by lat lng
api_list.description: Retrieve listings count in a range from a given geographical point. Can be filtered on bedrooms and max guest capacity

required_parameters.name: range
required_parameters.description: range in meters from latitude and longitude point

optional_parameters.name: maxGuestCapacity
optional_parameters.description: Max guest the listing can accomodate

api_list.name: Count Listings by administrative divisions
api_list.description: Retrieve listings count in the specified geographic area. Geocrafic area names can be found from "Get administrative divisions" endpoint. admin* parameters are optional but to use admin2, admin1 is required, to use admin 3, admin2 and admin1 are required and so on. Not respecting this requirement could give you unwanted results (ie listings with cities with the same name but in different countries). Can be filtered on bedrooms and max guest capacity

api_list.name: Listing Details
Listing Prices Full
api_list.description: Retrieve listing prices for the next 12 months

api_list.name: Listing Availability Full
api_list.description:
Retrieve listing availability and stay length rules for the next 12 months
**Note**: The fact the available field is true does not means that the listing can be booked. It only tells indicates that it is not taken. To confirm if it is really available for stay you must verify all previous and following day rules for stay length are respected.

api_list.name: Listing Availability
api_list.description:
Retrieve listing availability and stay length rules for the requested month.
**Note**: The fact the available field is true does not means that the listing can be booked. It only tells indicates that it is not taken. To confirm if it is really available for stay you must verify all previous and following day rules for stay length are respected.

api_list.name: Listing status Full
api_list.description: Retrieve the calculated status (available/not available for stay) for the next 12 months of a listing based on previous and following days stay rules.

api_list.name: Listing Prices
api_list.description: Retrieve listing prices for the requested month

api_list.name: Listing status
api_list.description: Retrieve the calculated status (available/not available for stay) of a listing based on previous and following days stay rules.

api_list.name: Prices and Availability by administrative divisions
api_list.description: Retrieve average Price, average price of available properties only, availability percent and number of processed properties in an geographical administrative division. Geographic area names can be found from "Get administrative divisions" endpoint. admin* parameters are optional but to use admin2, admin1 is required, to use admin 3, admin2 and admin1 are required and so on. Not respecting this requirement could give you unwanted results (ie listings with cities with the same name but in different countries). Can be filtered on bedrooms and max guest capacity.

api_list.name: Get administrative divisions
api_list.description: Retrieve geographical admin names to be used in Listing by georef endpoint. admin* parameters are optional but to use admin2, admin1 is required, to use admin 3, admin2 and admin1 are required and so on. Not respecting this requirement could give you unwanted results (ie cities with the same name but in different countries). Returns 50 results

api_list.name: Prices and Availability by lat lng
api_list.description: Retrieve average Price, average price of available properties only, availability percent and number of processed properties in a range from a given geographical point. Max range is 20000 meters. Can be filtered on bedrooms and max guest capacity.

required_parameters.name: range
required_parameters.description: range in meters from latitude and longitude point

optional_parameters.name: maxGuestCapacity
optional_parameters.description: Max guest the listing can accomodate

api_list.name: Amenities
api_list.description: Retrieves amenities ids And descriptions. Returns 50 results

api_list.name: Markets
api_list.description: Retrieve Market names to be used in Listing by market endpoint. Returns 50 results

api_list.name: Connect test
api_list.description: No parameters needed. Useful to test connectivity and authentication
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://airbnb-listings.p.rapidapi.com/v2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airbnb-listings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://airbnb-listings.p.rapidapi.com/v2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "airbnb-listings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
